calc.view

Class GuiView

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • calc.view.GuiView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewInterface

    public class GuiView
extends javafx.application.Application
implements ViewInterface
    The CalcView class is responsible for loading the FXView fxml file, and communicates with CalcController to handle user inputs and display outputs.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Dave Cohen
